00005 void* __memAllocate(size_t numelem, size_t elemsize) {
00006   void* chunk = calloc(numelem, elemsize); /* Aloc a new array. */
00007 
00008   if (chunk == NULL) { /* If it didn't aloc, return error. */
00009     fprintf(stderr, "Erro ao alocar %d bytes. Abortando programa.\n", numelem*elemsize);
00010     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00011   }
00012 
00013   return chunk;
00014 }
